> I have a program which generates two files, one an SVG file 
> and the other a
> simple HTML page.
> 
> What is the best way to use JUnit to perform the tests?  
> 
> I don't really like the idea of doing file comparisons and 
> would like some
> ideas on how to do this kind of testing

write to a stream, redirect the stream to a string,
do a string compare.

Bernd
